articles.title: Countries send help to fight huge forest fire in Cyprus - CBC.ca
articles.description: Cyprus asked fellow European Union nations on Saturday to help battle a huge forest fire in a mountainous region of the east Mediterranean island nation that has forced the evacuation of at least seven villages.
